sources.title: The Promoter
sources.description: Title: The Promoter Summary: A charming and ambitious young man finds many ways to raise himself through the ranks in business and social standing, some honest, some not quite so. If he can just manage to avoid a ... Directed by: Ronald Neame Actors: Alec Guinness, Glynis Johns, Valerie Hobson Production Company: J. Arthur Rank Organisation Release Date: 14 August 1952 (Sweden) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A charming and ambitious young man finds many ways to raise himself through the ranks in business and social standing, some honest, some not quite so. If he can just manage to avoid a certain very predatory woman.
